EmailTemplate.name: Web Despatch Restricted Access CSSO
EmailTemplate.subject: Web Despatch is now View Only
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
A business of Australia Post
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We recently contacted you about making the switch from Web Despatch to Parcel Send.
We’ve already set up your account, so Log in to Parcel Send now using your existing Australia Post details to start sending.
You’ll still have access to Web Despatch to view Proof of Deliveries (PODs) and obtain pricing estimates until these features are available in Parcel Send.
Visit our website for more information on getting the most out of Parcel Send.
Note: Currently, Parcel Send works best in the following browsers:
Chrome 63 Firefox 57 Safari 11.0.2
Log in
Forgot your password?
Simply select Forgot Password and follow the prompts to reset your password.
Still have questions?
If you’ve got any questions, please email our friendly support team at lodgementmigration@auspost.com.au.
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
